name: Brand Digital Presence Finder Pro
short_description: Real-time brand presence discovery across 14 platforms with live verification and competitor insights
description: Advanced AI-powered brand presence analysis with real-time search capabilities across major digital platforms including Google Business, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, X (Twitter), Facebook, Medium, Tumblr, Threads, Quora, Reddit, and Blue Sky. Features live verification, actual profile URLs, search rankings, competitor analysis, and actionable recommendations powered by SERP API and GPT-4.

fields.name: brand_name
fields.label: Brand Name
fields.placeholder: Enter your brand name (e.g., Tesla, Nike)

validation.message: Brand name should contain only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, dots, and apostrophes
Please enter a valid website URL (e.g., https://www.example.com)

fields.name: include_competitor_analysis
fields.label: Include Competitor Analysis
fields.placeholder: Analyze top 3 competitors in search results

platforms.name: Google Business
platforms.notes: Verified business listing with 4.8/5 rating, 1,234 reviews

platforms.name: LinkedIn

platforms.recommendation: Create LinkedIn Company Page - essential for B2B credibility
